document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">put </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">World </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Bundle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">walk </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">steady, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Requires </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Energy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">possibly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Agony </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Scarlet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Trodden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">straight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">renunciation </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Son </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Later, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">faint </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Confederates </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Justify </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Road </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Flavors </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">old </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Crucifixion </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Filaments </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Bloom, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Pontius </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Pilate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">sowed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Strong </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Clusters, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Barabbas' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Tomb </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Sacrament, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0c4b4">Saints </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">partook </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">before </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Patent, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">every </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">drop, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Brand </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Gentile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Drinker </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">indorsed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Cup </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: To put this world down like a bundle
